oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photomontage of Davidson County Tuberculosis Hospital. Nashville Banner, 1927 July 10.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tucker, B. G.; Tucker, Mrs. B. G.; Zander, Herman
Nashville Banner
Hospitals; Children; Nurses
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs; Nashville and Davidson County (Tenn.)--History--Sources
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of Davidson County Tuberculosis Hospital. Page includes pictures of child patients, exterior images, nurses and their quarters, a playground, the superintendent, the kitchen, and a ward. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Barr, W. E.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
